articles.title: Code, Compute and Connection: Inside the Inaugural NVIDIA AI Day São Paulo

articles.title: Nvidia’s new technique cuts LLM reasoning costs by 8x without losing accuracy
articles.metaDescription: Researchers at Nvidia have developed a technique that can reduce the memory costs of large language model reasoning by up to eight times. Their technique, called dynamic memory sparsification (DMS), c
articles.summary: Researchers at Nvidia have developed a technique that can reduce the costs of large language model reasoning by up to eight times. Their technique, called dynamic memory sparsification (DMS), is called dynamicmemory sparsified.

articles.title: OpenAI deploys Cerebras chips for 'near-instant' code generation in first major move beyond Nvidia
